text:
Created attachment 22259
patch for configure.in

When trying to use the apr-iconv with apr-utils, I noticed that the path for include directories contained something like <prefix>/apu_apriconv_dir/include.

This is obviously due to a missing $ in configure and likewise in configure.in.

After the fix, the compilation process took much longer than before, but unfortunately, the apr-iconv is still not linked - may be due to the fact that the system contains a usable iconv anyway?
creator: mvishchers@psi.de
bojan@rexursive.com
text: Fixed in both trunk and 1.3.x. Thanks for the patch!
